title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.23 - Central stores
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.23 - Central stores

State Regulations

The central storage area shall have a total area of not
less than 10 square feet per bed. Total area requirements shall be determined
by the hospital's storage requirements. (a) Accessibility to delivery areas should be
independent of routes at traffic for patients, staff and visitors. Accessibility to such areas shall not be through the lobby or patient
areas. (b) Adequate space for
receiving and delivery, scales, storage facilities, clerical, and file space in
the receiving area shall be provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
712-1.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
